resources.string:
Hi, my name is Sameera. 

 I am 31 years old. I am from India, now settled in Bristol, UK. 

 I started learning how to code 5 months ago. And so far, I have learnt HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL. Right now, I am working on Kotlin and learning how to create Android apps. I am really enjoying it. 

 I have also lived in Delhi for a short while, then London, later Paris, and now finally in Bristol. 

 I am a vegetarian, and I love cooking and travelling. 
 I have a 3 years old little girl who is the light of my life.


 I will be happy to answer any questions regarding cooking or coding, though I am still a beginner.
